snippet: Gov. Martin O’Malley, Democrat of Maryland, and Gov. Bob McDonnell, Republican of Virginia, whose states share a history rich in both rivalry and cooperation, must sometimes work together in regional partnerships.
abstract: Maryland Gov Martin O'Malley, Democrat, and Virginia Gov Bob McDonnell, Republican, are both rising stars in their respective parties who sometimes must work together in regional partnerships; both men reflect longstanding rivalries and cooperation that exist between their states.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Martin O’Malley, Democrat of Maryland, and Gov. Bob McDonnell, Republican of Virginia, whose states share a history rich in both rivalry and cooperation, must sometimes work together in regional partnerships.

headline.seo: Maryland and Virginia Governors Rising in Their Parties
headline.main: Leading Maryland and Virginia, With Stars on the Rise
headline.print_headline: Leading Maryland and Virginia, With Stars on the Rise
